author: giantorange
title: Invaluable addition to the 4.5V Battery motor.
review:
Two highly useful reduction gears.  Both reduce by 20:1.

The first attaches directly to the 4.5 volt battery motor and gives a straight through drive.  The second attaches via a 4x3x3 stud adapter and has a straight through drive at standard speed with a 90degree drive via a spindle at the reduced speed.  This second gearbox is ideal for running car axles from the higher speed motor.

Also includes a highly useful length of gear chain, along with a few small cogs and axles.

Not much in the way of building experience or playability as a standalone set as this is designed as a spares pack to use with other sets.
